definitions.definition: An object (such as holy water or a crucifix ) or an action (such as making the sign of the cross ) which is regarded as encouraging devotion and thus spiritually aiding the person who uses it.

main_definition: ( Christianity , chiefly Roman Catholicism ) An object (such as holy water or a crucifix ) or an action (such as making the sign of the cross ) which is regarded as encouraging devotion and thus spiritually aiding the person who uses it.
